entry.title: WIND WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 10:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning near noon then changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
